entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023
